etymology.description: 时(時) (shí, "time; season") + 间(間) (jiān, "interval; space") = The concept of time as an interval or space in which events occur.
etymology.interpretation: 时间(時間) (shíjiān, "time") combines the idea of a specific time or season with the notion of an interval or space, highlighting how events are placed within temporal intervals.

examples.chinese: 你有时间吗(你有時間嗎)？
我没有时间看电视(我沒有時間看電視)。
examples.english: I don't have time to watch TV.

examples.chinese: 时间在慢慢流逝(時間在慢慢流逝)，我们要珍惜它(我們要珍惜它)。
examples.pinyin: shíjiān zài màn màn liú shì, wǒmen yào zhēnxī tā。
examples.english: Time is passing slowly, we must cherish it.
